title: Next Brexit steps: How does the UK leave the European Union by Oct 31?
text:
Friday, Oct 18 Morning:EU Leaders in Brussels to discuss the European Union's budget on day two of the European Council Summit.

Friday, Oct 18: Geoffrey Cox, Attorney General, is expected to publish his legal advice on the Brexit deal.

Friday, Oct 18: Remain MPs in Westminster prepare amendments to the Government's motion to approve the Brexit deal.

Sat, Oct 19: Parliament to sit from 9.30am until 2.30pm, for the first time since the Falklands Crisis in 1982

Sat, Oct 19 Morning: Boris Johnson to update MPs on the EU Council to the House of Commons.

Sat, Oct 19 Afternoon: Government to move motions to approve Brexit deal in what will be termed Meaningful Vote 4. A second motion will be moved...
